name: get_tile_offset
description: Returns the physical offset of this <%= doc_class_name %> from the center of the <%= type 'Tile' %> they're standing on.
**Positive** X values mean it has been moved to the *right*, **negative** X values mean it has been moved to the *left*.
**Positive** Y values mean it has been moved *downwards*, **negative** Y values mean it has been moved *upwards*.
return_value_desc: The offset of this <%= doc_class_name %>. `X` : horizontal offset, `Y` : vertical offset.

text: This value is altered by movement, representing their physical position between <%= type 'Tile' %>s.
emsp;e.g. While the <%= doc_class_name %> is sliding, etc.
